Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
ShowRecommendationToConfigure_Descriptio: If true, users will get a message suggesting to enable 2FA if it's not enabled in their accounts yet
FacetIds_Description: List of app-key-hashes of mobile apps
ClockTolerance_Description: Value set to N means that codes starting from N * 30sec ago to N * 30sec from now are accepted
AllowBackupCodes_Description: If set to true, and if authenticator app or security key configured, users are able to use backup codes
TrustDevicesForDays_Description: Allows for expiry of trusted device list entries after certain amount of days
IncludeInMobile_Description: If true, the module is used in mobile version of the interface
IncludeInDesktop_Description: If true, the module is used in desktop version of the interface
RequireInMobile_Description: List of other modules required by this module
